tasks.title: Mastering Custom Hooks
tasks.description: Deep dive into creating reusable logic with custom hooks, handling complex state, and side effects efficiently.

tasks.title: React Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Learn techniques like memoization (useMemo, useCallback), virtualization, and code splitting to build high-performance apps.

tasks.title: State Management at Scale
tasks.description: Explore advanced state management with Redux Toolkit, Zustand, or Recoil for large-scale applications.

tasks.title: Server vs. Client Components
tasks.description: Understand the paradigm shift in Next.js 13+, knowing when to use server components for performance and client components for interactivity.

tasks.title: Data Fetching & Caching
tasks.description: Implement advanced data fetching patterns, caching strategies, and revalidation in the App Router.

tasks.title: Server Actions & Mutations
tasks.description: Build type-safe mutations without API routes using Server Actions for seamless form handling and data updates.

tasks.title: Authentication & Authorization
tasks.description: Integrate robust authentication using NextAuth.js or Clerk, handling middleware and protected routes.
